message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1200000. This is a fair price considering its value to you and my own needs. I believe it's a win-win situation. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $900000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1100000, which still leaves room for you to make a good profit. This is my final offer. Let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1100000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I'm trying to stay within my budget, and I hope we can meet in the middle.

Bob, I understand you're working within a budget, but $950000 is still significantly below what I need to make this deal work.  I'm willing to go down to $1050000. This is a fair compromise, and I believe it gives you a good deal while still allowing me to achieve my goals. I'm open to discussing this further, but this is my final offer.
